original_title: 仮面ライダーエグゼイド [裏技] 仮面ライダーレーザー
overview: Kamen Rider Ex-Aid [Tricks] - Kamen Rider Lazer is Hyper Battle DVD featuring characters from the Kamen Rider Ex-Aid television series. Through Kiriya's laptop, the group stumbles upon his last message regarding a game needed to be cleared, the treasure-hunting game Bakusou Treasure.
title: Kamen Rider Ex-Aid [Tricks]: Kamen Rider Lazer
